name: sputlytics
description: Sputlytics is a web analytics platform for blogs and websites, like Google Analytics but open-source and self-hosted, with easy setup and extensible codes to customize metrics according to your needs.

ROOT_URL.description: IMPORTANT! Must be 'https://<App Name>.herokuapp.com' Replace <App Name> with the value you provided at the top. This will be the full URL of your App.
